item.title: [Python] Introducing M5StickC (temperature and humidity measurement and MQTT transmission, UIFlow Python)
item.description: ![image.png](https://qiita-image-store.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/0/78212/cf08f29a-1af6-4abc-4aa5-6c640cda59d6.png) Screen display (temperature, humidity, atmospheric pressure, power supply voltage, MQTT transmission interval) All UIFlow graphical programs (Python code is automatically generated in real time) #Introduction “M5StickC” and “M5StickC ENV Hat (with DHT12/BMP280/BMM150)” were used to measure temperature, humidity and atmospheric pressure, and then send MQTT. The development environment is UIFlow V1.4.0-Beta. (UIFlow V1.3.2 does not seem to support ENV Hat.) Python code is generated in real time from a graphical program, which is nice.
